name: Wave Run
description:
Wave Run-
Wave Run is a fast paced mini platformed about beating your best times jumping & jetting your way through tough challenges. Fly through 33 unique time trials and collect as many trophies as you can!

Controls-
Keyboard/Controller:

Arrow keys/Left stick - Move
Z/A - Jump
Z/A (in air) - Jet
X/X - Jet dash
Space/Start - Pause
R/Y - Toggle high score mode

A - Restart current trial
Q - Restart previous last trial
1 - Restart stage

To clear your save data, press "Shift+N" on the start menu.

Credits-

Game by Jamie Rollo
Twitter

Featuring music by Jared Hahn
Twitter
Itch.io

Wave Run was originally created for Global Game Jam 2017, you can download the original build here:
http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/wave-run-0
